articles.title: Premier League: After a VERY weird season, one Sportsmail hack has another go at the final table - Daily Mail
articles.description: There's now just seven weeks left of the Premier League season to go with the table taking shape. Sportsmail makes another attempt at predicting the final standings for the end of the campaign.
articles.content:
The most unpredictable season is now looking a little clearer.
